Text: Re FW Restated CAPEX Plan Cc Shelley first of all I apologize for not responding in a timely manner I should have responded that we were waiting to gather additional comments if any and make one global response mea culpa Second I received an email from Mike Mcgowan just a few moments ago wherein he is proposing a response to your request By copy of this memo you can anticipate that Mike will forward a response shortly Again sorry for the inconvenience
